 '''Anti''' may refer to: 
 
 * Anti-, a [[prefix]] meaning  " against " 
 * [[Anti (mythology)]], a boatman in Egyptian mythology 
 * [[Ã„nti]], or Antaeus, half-giant in Greek and Berber mythology 
 * [[Antiparticle]], a particle with the same mass but opposite charges in particle physics 
 * [[Anti addition]] in organic chemistry
